issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Since the scheduling of heartbeat happens immediately after lock acquisition, it's unnecessary to send heartbeat at the time when locks is acquired. Add an initial delay to skip this.
fields.summary: Add an initial delay when starting the heartbeat

ATTACHMENT ID: 12805955 - PreCommit-HIVE-MASTER-Build

Removing 2.1.0 target as issue is not tagged as Critical/Blocker and the RC will be created tomorrow. Please feel free to commit to branch-2.1 anyway and fix for 2.1.0 if this happens before the release.
